title: I believe riots scripting ban system doesn't work.
body:

Anyway i'm unemployed and so i spend my time doing various athletic 'things' mixed with league games. and yes i have a extremely high reaction speed and muscle memory capability. 

 i'm honestly still salty about my faulty ban and i'm gonna do anything i can - there's a lot i can xD! to make sure riot pays for it. not just the accounts value but wasted time if i can get that too.

Just so you know, you didn't buy any merchandise from riot games, you rented it. I would suggest reading the terms and conditions you agreed to before trying to take anyone to court (specifically section 4.3 in this case). You also agreed that your account could be denied service at any time (they list some specifics that basically cover any situation), and also through the use of automated detection services (section 2.1.2).

If you think you have found a way to falsely trigger any of their detection software I would suggest submitting a ticket with the information you (think you) have. They probably wont give you any information regarding it as that would possibly make it easier for others to avoid being caught, but it may help.

Also, I will go ahead and say that, although I have no proof, I am very sure that you cannot cause their automated systems into banning you by having high reflexes. If you could then professional players would be getting banned as basically all they do is practice the game and reflexes are part of that.
